name: addMeme {meme-key} {meme-url}
value: Add a new meme. The {meme-key} will be used to play the associated {meme-url}.

name: deleteMeme {meme-key}
value: Deletes a meme from the list.

name: updateMeme {old-meme-key} {url} {new-meme-key-optional}
value: Update a meme content or a meme key from the list.

name: getMeme
value: Play a random meme. We can also specify a meme to play.

name: memes {meme-key} OR meme-key
value: Get a reactive list with the available memes in the database.

name: commands
value: Get a list of all available commands.
